item.title: Embrace discomfort
item.description: There it was. The blank page. My fingers over the keyboard, frozen by an invisible force that seemed to mock my every attempt at creativity. Words, usually flowing like a gentle stream of through my fingertips, had become strangers in the night â€“ elusive, distant, and maddeningly out of reach. This wasn’t writer’s block. No. This was war: a daily battle against the twin demons of frustration and self-doubt. “Maybe I’m just not good enough.
